text: MediationZone includes direct support for ASN.1 format specifications. Any ASN.1 specification can be directly imported into the system and a corresponding BER or PER decoder/encoder is automatically generated. Using this capability, MediationZone can directly support any ASN.1 based specification. Open Ultra Format Editor - ASN.1 format management
title: ASN.1 Formats - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
